Myrick family, S. P. M. (2021). Seans (@seanpm2001/@seanwallawalla/@seantrm) personal GitHub organization info database. It is here for reference and documentation purposes. It lists all my organizations, their purpose, info about them, and more. It also offers utilities to enhance the experience. It is used for documentation and reference purposes. Among the things documented includes profile pictures, descriptions, URLs, information about how the orgs are used, their creation date, what they are for, and more. [Data set]. https://doi.org/10.0000/00000
